channel.description: Recent content on A Hugo website

item.title: Alcohol consumption and happiness
item.description: In this short analysis i was curious about the connection of countries state of global happiness and their alcohol consumptions. Are people more or less happy in countries where a lot of alcohol is consumed? Do happy countries have different alcohol consuming habits? To answer this question i am investigating two datasets available online in kagle. One of the datasets is the World Happiness Report which is a landmark survey of the state of global happiness.

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Marcell Puski, I am studying cognitive psychology at Eötvös Loránd Tudományegyetem. This website is a project for one of my courses at the university.
